sentences.english: Interior is very attractive, living room with arched roof, leaded glass windows.
sentences.chinese: 内部非常诱人，客厅有拱形屋顶，铅玻璃窗户。

sentences.english: He thought of here, go down the windows fly.
sentences.chinese: 他想到这儿，顺着窗户飞了下去。

sentences.english: It was a tall, red brick building with windows boarded up on every side of the building.
sentences.chinese: 校舍很高，用红砖砌成，每面窗户都用木板封住了。

sentences.english: He egged her on  to throw a stone through the window.
sentences.chinese: 他怂恿她扔一块石头打破窗户。

sentences.english: The tall Gothic windows glinted in the sinking sun.
sentences.chinese: 高大的哥特式窗户在夕阳的照耀下闪闪发光。

sentences.english: "Save us", read a banner hung from one of the upper floor windows.
sentences.chinese: “救救我们”，较高楼层的窗户上挂出这样的横幅。

sentences.english: Step 6: If you cannot open the doors, look for an emergency exit window.
sentences.chinese: 如果无法打开紧急车门，则寻找太平门窗户。

sentences.english: The window is never open except in summer.
sentences.chinese: 这扇窗户从来不开，夏季除外。

sentences.english: A sudden gust of wind from the open window puffed the candle out.
sentences.chinese: 从开着的窗户吹来一阵急风，吹灭了蜡烛。

sentences.english: He lived in a small room which window faced west.
sentences.chinese: 他住在一间窗户朝西的小房间里。

sentences.english: Cardboard boxes for the tenements, doors and windows painstankingly detailed with coloured pens.
sentences.chinese: 用水彩笔描绘的纸板箱是用来装公寓，大门和窗户的。

sentences.english: This is the building whose windows were all painted green.
sentences.chinese: 这就是窗户都漆成绿色的那幢楼。

sentences.english: Voldemort throws Wormtail out of a window.
sentences.chinese: 老伏把虫尾巴丢出窗户。

sentences.english: Tap with your shoe on the window, and he will let us in.
sentences.chinese: 用你的鞋轻叩窗户，他就会让我们进去的。

sentences.english: Install the shades as close to the glass as possible.
sentences.chinese: 安装的时候，尽量把这种遮光窗户和玻璃安的紧一点。

sentences.english: The windows were decorated with decorated by a fringe of pinked cloth.
sentences.chinese: 窗户用锯齿形的布做成的流苏作装饰。

definition: variant of 陽臺|阳台[yang2 tai2]
window/the opening panel of a window
